summary: MY WIFE WAS LEAVING WORK AND UPON SETTING IN THE CAR HEAR A LOAD NOISE, ON INVESTIGATION BY A AAA MECHANIC THE FRONT COIL SPRING ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE HAD BROKEN AND PUNCTURED THE TIRE.  THE PLASTIC LINKAGE CONNECTING THE ANTI-SWAY BAR WAS ALSO BROKEN.  IF THE CAR HAD BEEN MOVING IT WOULD HAVE WRECKED AND POSSIBLY ROLLED.  I THOUGHT THIS HAD BEEN FIXED ON EARLIER MODELS OF THE TAURUS, I KNOW THERE WAS A RECALL TO PUT ANTI-PUNCTURE PROTECTION FROM BROKEN SPRINGS.   *NLM
